snippet.title: Advent NEON  - Kickstarter Announcement Trailer (& New Demo!)
snippet.description:
It's happening. August 24th, 2021. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/cryogx/advent-neon-hyperactive-2d-action-platforming

This announcement comes with a NEW DEMO released to Itch.io and Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1528260/AdventNEON/
https://cryogx.itch.io/advent-neon

Thank you all for the immense support thus far, but it's time to kick things into higher gear. Hope y'all are ready!

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/AdventNeon

#CryoGX #AdventNEON #Kickstarter
